name: 2.1.0-master_20170824
body:
Primarily a patch release to fix a fundamental bug in the cron module.
- Fix for #2080
- New native module for DS18B20, #2003 
- Rewrite of the Lua DS18B20 module, #1996 

Take a look at the ['2.1 follow-up patch' milestone](https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-firmware/milestone/7) for the full list of all issues included in this release.

name: 2.1.0-master_20170811
body:
- Various bug fixes
- Removal of some deprecated code
- New module mcp4725, #1966 
- Version 2.0 of the Lua Develoer FAQ, #1899
- `wifi.sta.config` will save config to flash by default, #1998 
- pmsleep and timer_suspend are now disabled by default, #2064

Take a look at the [2.1 follow-up milestone](https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-firmware/milestone/6?closed=1) for the full list of all issues included in this release.

name: 2.1.0-master_20170521
body:
- Upgrade to SDK 2.1.0
- Full support for >4MB flash chips
- New modules: ADS1115, Si7021, HDC1080, TCS34725, XPT2046 touch controller
- Streaming JSON module SJSON replaces CJSON
- `wifi.suspend()`, `node.sleep()` and improved `node.dsleep()` help reduce power consumption
- TIME_WAIT socket fixes

Take a look at the [2.1 milestone](https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-firmware/milestone/5) for the full list of all issues included in this release.

name: 2.0.0-master_20170202
body:
- numerous fixes to the EUS module.
- new rfswitch module
- new Cron module
- HTTP module can now chain requests
- new WPS module, #1694 
- rework support for modules with >4MB flash chips
- new node.random function
- rewrite of net module on top of [lwIP](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LwIP), breaking changes to UDP handling (https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-firmware/issues/1080#issuecomment-270051704), `close()` doesn't trigger `disconnection` event any more (#1716)

See the milestone for the [full list of changes](https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-firmware/milestone/4?closed=1).

name: 1.5.4.1-master_20161201
body:
- Somfy/TELIS driver, #1521
- object model for the file module, see [docs](http://nodemcu.readthedocs.io/en/latest/en/modules/file/)
- automatically write esp init data to correct memory address if necessary, doesn't need to be flashed manually anymore, see [docs](http://nodemcu.readthedocs.io/en/latest/en/flash/)
- bug fixes in many modules
- support for custom websocket headers
- support to mix ws2812.buffer objects

For details see the [PRs list](https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-firmware/milestone/3?closed=1).

name: 1.5.4.1-master_20161001
body:
- new websocket module
- FatFS and SD card support
- update u8glib to v1.19.1
- dynamic timers support
- remove deprecated devkit 0.9 specific functions
- HTTP module: follow redirects, allow to override host and user-agent headers

For details see https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-firmware/milestone/2

name: 1.5.4.1-master_20160802
body:
- [SDK 1.5.4.1](http://bbs.espressif.com/viewtopic.php?f=46&t=2376), pay attention to the [flashing instructions for upgrading](http://nodemcu.readthedocs.io/en/latest/en/flash/#upgrading-firmware)
- upgrading SPIFFS
- a number of bug fixes
- improvements to WS2812
- new modules: Switec, PCM, HMC5883L, L3G4200D, ADXL345

For the complete list check the [1.5.4.1 milestone](https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-firmware/milestone/1).

name: 1.5.1-master_20160603
body:
- completely new documentation based on MkDocs and Read the Docs at https://nodemcu.readthedocs.io
- 10 new modules: http, apa102, am2320, bme280, encoder, mdns, perf, rotary, sigma_delta, struct
- UART auto-baud detection, default baud switched to 115'200
- lots of bug fixes
- enhanced enduser_setup module
- SDK 1.5.1

name: 1.4.0-master_20151229: Retroactively tagged stable drop
body: Due to the ever-growing number of modules available within NodeMCU, pre-built binaries are no longer made available. Use the automated custom firmware [build service](http://nodemcu-build.com/) to get the specific firmware configuration you need, or consult the [documentation](http://nodemcu.readthedocs.io/en/dev/en/build/) for details on firmware building.

name: 0.9.6-dev_20150627
body:
fixed ap/station-ap cannot connect to the device.
added wifi.ap.getconfig(). 
fixed net.dns.getdnsserver(). 
added new base64 lua example. 
added node.bootreason() to inspect boot cause. 
optimization of u8g.
